title: error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1
body:
I tried this code on M1 MacBook, running the terminal through rosetta2: ```rust fn main() { println!("Hello, world!"); } ``` I expected to see this happen: I expect I can compile it with `cargo run` Instead, this happened: I got the following errors ```shell error: linking with `cc` failed: exit code: 1 | = note: "cc" "-m64" "-arch" "x86_64" "-L" "/nix/store/arlm9vp4a8bqzp43pw1gncmf40cc74sc-rustc-1.52.1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-apple-darwin/lib" "/Users/hugosum/Desktop/prelude/target/debug/deps/prelude.prelude.2f2tfrr8-cgu.0.rcgu.o" "/Users/hugosum/Desktop/prelude/target/debug/deps/prelude.prelude.2f2tfrr8-cgu.1.rcgu.o" "/Users/hugosum/Desktop/prelude/target/debug/deps/prelude.prelude.2f2tfrr8-cgu.2.rcgu.o" "/Users/hugosum/Desktop/prelude/target/debug/deps/prelude.456uu2w0qh9ux0r7.rcgu.o" "-Wl,-dead_strip" "-nodefaultlibs" "-L" "/Users/hugosum/Desktop/prelude/target/debug/deps" "-L" "/nix/store/arlm9vp4a8bqzp43pw1gncmf40cc74sc-rustc-1.52.1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-apple-darwin/lib" "/nix/store/arlm9vp4a8bqzp43pw1gncmf40cc74sc-rustc-1.52.1/lib/rustlib/x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/libstd-351eea491abe4434.rlib" library not found for -liconv collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status error: aborting due to previous error error: could not compile `prelude` ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.1 binary: rustc commit-hash: unknown commit-date: unknown host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.52.1 LLVM version: 12.0.0 ```
